content.text: Hi, I'm Sarah, what's your name?
I'm Mike, what do you do for a living?
I'm a server at a restaurant, I'm thinking about getting a different job though.
Why do you want a different job?
I'm not sure if I want to work in a restaurant anymore, and I'm not sure what else I would do.
You could always try working at HP, my adopted dad works there and he loves it.
I've never thought about working at HP, what does your dad do there?
He's a software engineer, he designs software for printers.
That sounds interesting, I'll have to look into it.
Good luck, I'm sure you'll find something you enjoy.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to take walks, ride my bike, and play video games.
I love to take walks too, it's a great way to relax.
It is, and it's also good for exercise.
Yeah, I need to get more exercise, I've been watching too much TV lately.
Me too, I need to get up and move around more.
We should go on a walk together sometime, it would be a good way to get to know each other.
That sounds like a great idea, I'd love to go on a walk with you.
